titles.title: Waiting Here For You
If faith can move the mountains

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c v3 c b c

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: If faith can move the mountains Let the mountains move We come with expectation Waiting here for you, waiting here for you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You’re the Lord of all creation And still you know my heart The Author of Salvation You’ve loved us from the start

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Waiting here for You With our hands lifted high in praise And it's You we adore Singing Alleluia

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You are everything You’ve promised Your faithfulness is true And we're desperate for Your presence All we need is You
